checkout.failed: Sorry but the payment failed, you can try again or reach us for help
checkout.success: Payment is successful, your order is being handled !

common.required-fields: Fields marked with a star * are required.

error.alert-message-suffix: Sorry for the inconvenience, contact us with this error code so that we can help you : {code}
error.api-needed: An API is needed for this un-mocked call
error.duplicate_key: This email belong to an account, please login or sign-up with another email
error.internal: An internal error appeared, please contact us
error.invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address
error.session-expired: Your session expired, please login again
error.unknown: An unexpected error happened, sorry for that.

login.welcome: Welcome to Green is better order app !

order.choose-formula: Choose your formula : | Choose another formula :
order.no-formulas: Sorry but this store has no formulas available right now, please select another store.

pick.you-can-pick-n-allergens-or-more: You can select one allergen | You can select multiple allergens
pick.you-can-pick-n-base: You can pick a base | You can pick {n} bases
pick.you-can-pick-n-dessert: You can choose one desert | You can choose {n} deserts
pick.you-can-pick-n-diets-or-more: You can select one diet | You can select multiple diets
pick.you-can-pick-n-drink: You can choose a drink | You can choose {n} drinks
pick.you-can-pick-n-drink-dessert: You can pick one drink or one desert | You can pick {n} of these
pick.you-can-pick-n-ingredient: You can pick one ingredient | You can pick {n} ingredients
pick.you-can-pick-n-ingredient-or-more: You can pick one ingredient | You can pick {n} ingredients
pick.you-can-pick-n-sauce: You can pick one sauce | You can pick {n} sauces
pick.you-can-pick-n-stores: You can pick one restaurant | You can pick {n} restaurants
pick.you-can-pick-n-wrap-soup: You can pick a wrap or a soup | You can choose {n} of these

pre-login.no-account: I don't have an account yet
pre-login.welcome: Please sign in or register a free account to use it.

signup.step-1: Create your account to be able to order and personalize your experience.
signup.step-2: If you are on a diet or have allergies, you can indicate it at this step so that incompatible foods could be highlighted.
signup.step-3: This step allows you to define the place where you want to collect your orders.
signup.title: Account creation
